statements: DELETE FROM insurance_data WHERE insurance_type = 'Life Insurance';
DELETE FROM insurance_data WHERE insurance_type = 'Life Insurance' AND premium_amount > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM Insurance_Policies WHERE policy_holder = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Insurance_Claims WHERE claim_id = 500 AND policy_id = 200;
DELETE FROM insurance_policy WHERE policy_id = 100 AND policy_start_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 50 AND customer_age < 30;
DELETE FROM customer_data WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe'
